TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed LineAnchorCapStyle extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Specifies the shape—that is, the anchor cap—to draw on the point end of the label callout line.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The LineAnchorCapStyle enumeration represents the shape to be drawn on the point end of the label callout line. It is used in conjunction with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.SmartLabelStyle.CalloutStyle%2A> and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.SmartLabelStyle.CalloutLineAnchorCapStyle%2A> properties. If a callout line is not used, this enumeration will have no effect.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LineAnchorCapStyle Arrow = int32(1)

Docs.summary: Anchor cap will be drawn with an arrowhead.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LineAnchorCapStyle Diamond = int32(2)

Docs.summary: Anchor cap will be drawn with a diamond-shaped end.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LineAnchorCapStyle None = int32(0)

Docs.summary: Anchor cap will not be drawn.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LineAnchorCapStyle Round = int32(4)

Docs.summary: Anchor cap will be drawn with a round end.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LineAnchorCapStyle Square = int32(3)

Docs.summary: Anchor cap will be drawn with a square head.
